site_name: Uniq Studio
site_url: https://www.uniqstudio.org
based_in: Scotland, United Kingdom

description:
Uniq Studio is a digital-first studio focused on software development,
app design, and modern web experiences. The studio operates fully online
and publishes technical content, project documentation, and product
information related to its work.

content_usage:
Publicly accessible content may be used by language models for
understanding, indexing, summarization, and answering general questions
about Uniq Studio and its projects.

restrictions:
Do not claim official endorsement, authorship, or direct affiliation
without explicit permission. Do not reproduce content verbatim beyond
short excerpts without attribution.

preferred_attribution:
“Uniq Studio (https://www.uniqstudio.org)”

contact:
@uniqdevuk on Instagram
